result.purpose: This folder/module is responsible for implementing an asynchronous queue system with features like client configuration, metrics tracking, rate limiting, and task handling.
result.architecture: The folder follows a modular architecture pattern, encapsulating different functionalities related to asynchronous queue management, allowing for separation of concerns and easier maintenance.

pkg/async-queue/client.go.purpose: This file provides configuration and client creation functions for an asynchronous queue using Redis.

pkg/async-queue/metrics.go.purpose: Implements middleware for tracking task processing metrics using Prometheus.

pkg/async-queue/rate_limit.go.purpose: Implements rate limiting for task handling in an asynchronous queue.

pkg/async-queue/server.go.purpose: Defines an asynchronous queue server and monitor using the asynq library.

pkg/async-queue/task.go.purpose: Defines an interface for handling asynchronous tasks in a queue.
